title: CC functionality
extract: When referring to email, “cc” means carbon copy and “bbc” means “blind carbon copy”. Both “cc” and “bcc” are additional fields you can enter when sending an email. Every recipient email address you enter into the “to” and “cc” fields will be able to see each other.Nov 4, 2013
extract_html: When referring to email, “cc” means carbon copy and “bbc” means “blind carbon copy”. Both “cc” and “bcc” are additional fields you can enter when sending an email. Every recipient email address you enter into the “to” and “cc” fields will be able to see each other.Nov 4, 2013
